value.title: What is Power BI Shared Datasets? How to user to develop Multiple Reports using Single Dataset?
value.excerpt: This vLog, represent the information about Power BI Shared Datasets. First, we will be discussing, What is Shared Datasets, how we can develop the reports using data from the Shared Datasets and how the permission model for the Power BI Shared Datasets work.  In Power BI, Shared Dataset is a dataset

value.title: 3 ways Reporting Services and Power BI work together
value.excerpt: With the release of Microsoft SQL Server 2016, I look at how Reporting Services and Power BI work together. From the Power BI mobile app, to pinning visualizations to a dashboard and how Reporting Services handles Power BI Desktop files.  #PowerBI #SSRS  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. Patrick shows you 3 ways that can help do this without using Incremental Refresh or needing Power BI Premium!  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership
